mainChat

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainChat.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewObserver

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewObserver
    Can send commands to the model to update data structure and can send commands to change the view
    Author:
    Francesco Cozzolino, Stefano Belli

      • notifyClosing

        public void notifyClosing()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          javax.websocket.EncodeException
        Method called from the view class to notify that a closing attempt of the chat has been invoked. Here the closing handshake with the server is sent.
        Specified by:
        notifyClosing in interface ViewObserver
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.websocket.EncodeException
